get.description: Get random contract with 2 or more operations
Search any data in contracts, operations and big map diff with filters

parameters.description: Comma-separated field names among which will search
parameters.name: f

parameters.description: Return search result since given timestamp
parameters.name: s

parameters.description: Return search result before given timestamp
parameters.name: e

parameters.description: Grouping by contracts similarity. 0 - false, any others - true
parameters.name: g

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of indices for searching. Values: contract, operation, bigmapdiff
parameters.name: i

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of languages for searching. Values: smartpy, liquidity, ligo, lorentz, michelson
parameters.name: l
